name: ucsd-sunset
description: ðŸŒ… SunSET for UCSD: A crowd-sourced dataset of grade distributions submitted by students from their academic histories, to replace CAPEs' "Grades Students Received," which SETs no longer publish.

scripts.build:app: cp -a static/. dist/ && esbuild --bundle src/index.tsx --loader:.raw.js=text --loader:.svg=file --outdir=dist --supported:nesting=false --minify && find dist/ -type f | sed 's/dist\//https:\/\/sheeptester.github.io\/ucsd-sunset\//' > dist/sitemap.txt
